translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions in Reverse Order

analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Chapter on the Conditions in Direct Order

original: 21.22. Hetuduka, Pītittika🔽Nahetuṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nahetuṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuduka pītittika  na hetum na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca hetu pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na hetum na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca hetu sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With Root-Cause, With Joy🔽With a non-root-cause, non-joy-accompanied dhamma as condition there arises a root-cause, joy-accompanied dhamma, a root-cause condition. (In brief.) With root-cause as condition, three … with nonequipoise as condition, three.🔽With a non-root-cause, non-happiness-accompanied dhamma as condition there arises a root-cause, happiness-accompanied dhamma, a root-cause condition. (In brief.) With root-cause as condition, three … with nonequipoise as condition, three.

original: Nahetuṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca hetu upekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With a non-root-cause, non-equanimity-accompanied dhamma as condition there arises a root-cause, equanimity-accompanied dhamma, a root-cause condition. (In brief.) With root-cause as condition, three … with nonequipoise as condition, three.
